page.title: 07THE VILLAGE STORES
page.content: The village shop of{Southill}sells everything from Do It Yourself items, to jewelery and School equipment. The most popular of the selling products are the different types of{bread.}In the mornings they have a lot of custom from the school children,on their way to school.On a Sunday they are only open for two hours in the morning.Many people go there because it's the only shop in}Southill. The only energy they have is electricity,there is no gas at all.The delivery days are different, some days there are big deliveries and other days there are small ones.Thursdays are the main delivery days from a shop in the near by town of{Luton}.They also have them on Mondays and collect from other places.They deliver goods around Southill to the old people using a van too.
